targets.rawSql:
with clusters_by_datacenter as (
    SELECT DISTINCT e.oid as cluster_oid
      FROM entity e
      JOIN scope s on (s.seed_oid = e.oid)
     WHERE e.type = 'COMPUTE_CLUSTER'
       AND s.scoped_type = 'DATACENTER'
       AND CASE WHEN $datacenter = '0' THEN true ELSE s.scoped_oid = $datacenter END
       AND CASE WHEN $cluster = '0' THEN true ELSE e.oid = $cluster END
),

vms_by_cluster AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT on (e.oid) s1.scoped_oid as cluster_oid
        ,e.oid as vm_oid
        ,(e.attrs -> 'num_cpus')::int as vm_vcpus
      FROM entity e
      JOIN scope s1 ON (s1.seed_oid = e.oid)
     WHERE e.type = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE'
       AND (s1.scoped_type = 'COMPUTE_CLUSTER')
       AND (s1.scoped_oid in (select cluster_oid from clusters_by_datacenter))
       AND (e.first_seen, e.last_seen) OVERLAPS ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
       AND (s1.start, s1.finish) OVERLAPS ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
),

pms_by_cluster as (
    SELECT DISTINCT ON (e.oid)
        g.name as cluster_name,
        g.oid as cluster_oid,
        e.oid as pm_oid,
        (e.attrs -> 'num_cpus')::int as pm_cpus
      FROM entity e
      JOIN scope s1 ON (s1.seed_oid = e.oid)
      JOIN entity g ON (g.oid = s1.scoped_oid)
     WHERE e.type = 'PHYSICAL_MACHINE'
       AND (s1.scoped_type = 'COMPUTE_CLUSTER')
       AND (s1.scoped_oid in (select cluster_oid from clusters_by_datacenter))
       AND (e.first_seen, e.last_seen) OVERLAPS ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
       AND (s1.start, s1.finish) OVERLAPS ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
),

cluster_stats as (
    SELECT cluster_oid
          ,SUM(cpu_capacity) as cpu_capacity
          ,SUM(cpu_used) as cpu_used
          ,SUM(cpu_available) as cpu_available
          ,SUM(cpu_used) / SUM(cpu_capacity) as cpu_util
     from 
        (SELECT entity_oid as pm_oid
               ,AVG(current) as cpu_used
               ,AVG(capacity) as cpu_capacity
               ,AVG(capacity - current) as cpu_available
          FROM metric
         WHERE type = 'CPU'
           AND $__timeFilter(time)
           AND consumed is NULL
         GROUP BY 1) as pm_stats
    JOIN pms_by_cluster on pms_by_cluster.pm_oid = pm_stats.pm_oid
   GROUP BY 1
),

pm_counts as (
    SELECT cluster_oid
          ,COUNT(DISTINCT pm_oid) as pm_count
          ,SUM(pm_cpus) as cluster_cpus
      FROM pms_by_cluster
     GROUP BY 1
),

vm_counts as (
    SELECT cluster_oid
          ,COUNT(DISTINCT vm_oid) as vm_count
          ,SUM(vm_vcpus) as cluster_vcpus
      FROM vms_by_cluster
     GROUP BY 1
)

SELECT LEFT(pms_by_cluster.cluster_name, 3) as "Location", 
       SPLIT_PART(pms_by_cluster.cluster_name, '/', 1) as "Datacenter",
       SPLIT_PART(pms_by_cluster.cluster_name, '/', 2) as "Cluster Name",
       MAX(cpu_capacity) as "CPU Capacity",
       MAX(cpu_used) as "CPU Used",
       MAX(cpu_available) as "CPU Available",
       MAX(cpu_util) as "CPU Utilization",
       $hostThreshold::numeric as "CPU Threshold",
       ((1 - $hostThreshold)::numeric * SUM(cpu_capacity)) as "CPU Ideal Available",
       MAX((pm_count::numeric - 1) / pm_count) "N-1 CPU Threshold",
       MAX((1 - (pm_count::numeric - 1) / pm_count)) * SUM(cpu_capacity) "N-1 Ideal Available CPU",
       MAX((pm_count::numeric - 2) / pm_count) "N-2 CPU Threshold",
       MAX((1 - (pm_count::numeric - 2) / pm_count)) * SUM(cpu_capacity) "N-2 Ideal Available CPU",
       MAX(pm_count) "# Hosts",
       MAX(vm_count) "# VMs",
       AVG(pm_cpus) "Avg CPUs per Host",
       MAX(vm_vcpus::numeric/pm_cpus) "Max vCPU Ratio in Cluster",
       MAX(cluster_cpus) "CPUs per Cluster",
       MAX(cluster_vcpus) as "vCPUs"
  FROM cluster_stats, pm_counts, vm_counts, pms_by_cluster, vms_by_cluster
 WHERE vm_counts.cluster_oid = cluster_stats.cluster_oid
   AND pm_counts.cluster_oid = cluster_stats.cluster_oid
   AND pms_by_cluster.cluster_oid = cluster_stats.cluster_oid
   and vms_by_cluster.cluster_oid = pms_by_cluster.cluster_oid
 GROUP BY 1, 2, 3

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT name as __text
              ,oid as __value 
   FROM entity
 WHERE type = 'DATACENTER'
    AND (first_seen, last_seen) OVERLAPS ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
list.label: Datacenter
list.name: datacenter
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT name as __text
              ,oid as __value 
   FROM entity
 WHERE type = 'DATACENTER'
    AND (first_seen, last_seen) OVERLAPS ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT SPLIT_PART(name, '/', 2) as __text,
               oid as __value
    FROM entity e
    JOIN scope s on s.seed_oid = e.oid
  WHERE type = 'COMPUTE_CLUSTER'
      AND s.scoped_type = 'DATACENTER'
      AND (start, finish) OVERLAPS ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
      AND (first_seen, last_seen) OVERLAPS ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
      AND CASE WHEN $datacenter = '0' THEN true ELSE s.scoped_oid = $datacenter END
list.label: Cluster
list.name: cluster
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT SPLIT_PART(name, '/', 2) as __text,
               oid as __value
    FROM entity e
    JOIN scope s on s.seed_oid = e.oid
  WHERE type = 'COMPUTE_CLUSTER'
      AND s.scoped_type = 'DATACENTER'
      AND (start, finish) OVERLAPS ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
      AND (first_seen, last_seen) OVERLAPS ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
      AND CASE WHEN $datacenter = '0' THEN true ELSE s.scoped_oid = $datacenter END

list.definition:
SELECT generate_series || '%' as __text,
               generate_series*.01 as __value
  FROM generate_series(30,100,5)
list.label: CPU Threshold
list.name: hostThreshold
list.query:
SELECT generate_series || '%' as __text,
               generate_series*.01 as __value
  FROM generate_series(30,100,5)
